sentence.Network_en: Imperiously she beckoned me out of the room.
sentence.Network_cn: 她傲慢地招招手，把我叫出房间。

sentence.Network_en: He waved me back imperiously with his hand.
sentence.Network_cn: 他断然地挥挥手制止了我.

sentence.Network_en: The door opened slightly and Dr. Meade stood on the threshold, beckoning imperiously.
sentence.Network_cn: 门稍稍开了,米德大夫站在门口急平地招呼她.

entry.tran: 专横的;傲慢的;飞扬跋扈的
entry.def: If you describe someone as imperious, you mean that they have a proud manner and expect to be obeyed.

example.ex: Her attitude is imperious at times...
From across the desk she gave him a witheringly imperious look.
example.tran: 她从桌子对面扫了他一眼，目光咄咄逼人，凌利而专横。
